attributes.action: Start a counter Petition to encourage Donald Trumps state visit to the Uk
attributes.additional_details: A British business woman has set up this petition.
attributes.background: I am incensed that the media report only on the negatives regarding Donald Trump and do not debate hard enough on some of his policies that could be brilliant for the UK. I would like to counter the 'Ban Donald Trump' from the Uk with a 'Let's Welcome Donald Trump to the UK' petition.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want Donald Trump to make a state visit to the UK, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844
